entries.text: Returning to default settings. Is that okay?
Restoring all default settings. Is that okay?
Leaving all selected items. Is that okay?
Discarding all selected items. Is that okay?
Only eight items can be left at once. If you leave any more items, the items you left earlier will be lost, starting with the oldest. Is that okay?
Ashes of War are applied to <?itemName?>. If this item is lost, its Ashes of War will be lost as well. Is that okay?
Ashes of War are applied to <?itemName?>. If you discard this item, its Ashes of War will be lost. Is that okay?
Ashes of War are applied to an item you've selected. If that item is lost, its Ashes of War will be lost as well. Is that okay?
Ashes of War are applied to an item you've selected. If you discard that item, its Ashes of War will be lost. Is that okay?
This action will exceed maximum runes. Runes exceeding maximum will be lost. Use regardless?
Unable to use this item effectively with present attributes
Unable to use this item effectively with present attributes, unless wielded with both hands
Cannot summon this spirit at present level
Cannot equip talisman as an incompatible talisman is currently equipped
Cannot change equipment at this time
Loss of memory slots will result in removal of any excess sorceries or incantations. Is that okay?
Sorceries and incantations exceeding the number of memory slots have been removed
Using a Finger Remedy will send summoned spirits home. Is that okay?
Using a Finger Remedy will retract your summon sign. Is that okay?
Save the game and return to title menu?
Return to the title menu to change language settings
Settings have been changed. This will revert to the previous setting in <?remainingSec?> seconds. Keep current settings?
Some settings will only be applied after returning to title menu
This setting will be applied after restarting the game
Settings have been changed. This will revert to the previous setting in <?remainingSec?> seconds. Keep current settings?
Some settings will only be applied after returning to title menu
Some setting changes have not been applied. To apply these changes, return to the title menu.
Cannot travel to a site of grace from this location
Cannot travel to a site of grace during multiplayer
You cannot travel to a site of grace now
You have been trapped. You cannot travel to sites of grace until you rest at one.
Cannot travel to a site of grace right now
Cannot travel to a site of grace right now
Removing all markers placed. Is that okay?
You have placed the maximum number of markers and cannot place any more
Cannot focus on your current location
You have marked the maximum number of sites of grace and cannot mark any more
Removing the marker from this site of grace. Is that okay?
Canceling level up. Is that okay?
Select at least one attribute to level up
Level at maximum. Cannot raise level any further.
Reallocate attributes until you reach your original level
This will reduce your memory slots. Loss of memory slots will result in removal of any excess sorceries or incantations. Undergo rebirth?
Sorceries/incantations exceeding the number of memory slots have been removed
Remove these Ashes of War from <?itemNameBeforeForge?> and apply them to <?itemNameAfterForge?>?
If you change the equipped Great Rune, the current Great Rune's effects will be removed. Is that okay?
This cannot be strengthened, as you already have <?itemNameAfterForge?>
Armament cannot be strengthened any further at the smithing table
Offer <?demandSoul?> Dragon Hearts to make <?itemName?> thine own
This strength is already thine own
Cannot further duplicate this Ash of War
Items exceeding maximum have been placed in chest
Cannot receive. The number you would receive would exceed the maximum able to be held in inventory and storage.
Items exceeding maximum have been placed in chest
Cannot duplicate. The number you would receive would exceed the maximum able to be held in inventory and storage.
Items exceeding maximum have been placed in chest
Cannot purchase. The number you wish to buy would exceed the maximum able to be held in inventory and storage.
Out of stock. Cannot purchase anymore.
Ashes of War are applied to <?itemName?> . If you sell this item, its Ashes of War will be lost. Is that okay?
Crafted items exceeding maximum have been placed in chest
Cannot craft this item. The number you wish to craft would exceed the maximum able to be held in inventory and storage.
Cannot craft this item as you do not have enough cracked pots
Cannot craft this item as you do not have enough perfume bottles
Cannot craft this item as you do not have enough ritual pots
Cannot craft this item as you do not have any cracked pots
Cannot craft this item as you do not have any ritual pots
Cannot craft this item as you do not have any perfume bottles
Spend remembrance and <?demandSoul?> runes to receive <?itemName?>
Items exceeding maximum have been placed in chest
You cannot receive this power. The number you would receive would exceed the maximum able to be held in inventory and storage.
You cannot receive any more power from this remembrance, as you have reached its maximum
Altered items exceeding maximum have been placed in chest
You cannot alter these items. The number you would receive would exceed the maximum able to be held in inventory and storage.
You cannot alter any more of these items, as you have reached the maximum

Selected item cannot be placed in storage
Cannot store item. Storage is full.
Cannot retrieve item. Inventory is full.
Cannot memorize duplicate sorceries or incantations
Cannot use this sorcery or incantation with present attributes
Restoring all default settings. Is that okay?
Abandon this character and return to character base selection?
Starting game with this character. Is that okay?

A name is required.
Enter a name to finish creating this character.
Changes will be discarded. Is that okay?

Selected spelling contained inappropriate language and could not be used as a character name.
Enter another name.

Changing gender will reset certain changes.
Okay?

Changing appearance will mean losing any unsaved changes.
Is that okay?
Discard changes and stop applying cosmetics?
Finish applying cosmetics and proceed with this character?
A name is required. Enter a name to finish applying cosmetics.
Discard changes and stop applying cosmetics?
Finish applying cosmetics and proceed with this character?
A name is required. Enter a name to finish applying cosmetics.
Save present appearance as a favorite?
Overwrite favorite slot and save present appearance?
Discard present changes and load favorite?
Cannot load appearances corresponding to a different body type
Deleting selected favorite. Is that okay?
Cannot be edited at this time. Please set "Eye Alteration" to OFF to edit this.
Deleting this message. Is that okay?
This will delete message in progress. Is that okay?
Unable to acquire <?itemName?>. This would exceed the maximum able to be held in inventory and storage.
Unable to acquire every <?itemName?>. This would exceed the maximum able to be held in inventory and storage.
Some items could not be acquired as they would exceed the maximum able to be held in inventory and storage
Online connection is required to play ELDEN RING Network Test Version. Returning to title menu.
Discard present changes and return to previous page?
With HDR setting ON: Picture can be adjusted from the in-game system menu
Delete selected profile and begin a new game?
Deleting selected profile. Is that okay?
Begin Journey <?nextLoopCount?>? If you do not start over now, you can choose to begin Journey <?nextLoopCount?> later at the Table of Lost Grace in Roundtable Hold.
If you begin Journey <?nextLoopCount?>, you will not be able to return to the present world of Journey <?loopCount?>. Begin Journey <?nextLoopCount?>?
Send chosen player back to their world?
Multiplayer is temporarily disabled due to repeated irregular termination of multiplayer sessions
You were returned to your world due to inactivity
Close control guide and begin game?
As this product is still in development, some functionality (including features that use the Xbox network) may not be working as intended, and may result in shutdown
Unlike the final release, this product cannot be played without a network connection
